headerSubtitle: See your child's future face with AI!
uploadFamilyPhotosDesc: Please upload photos of the mother, father, and baby.
setFutureAgeDesc: Enter the future ages you want to see. (Max 4)
errorCurrentAge: Please enter a valid current age for the baby.
errorTargetAge: Please enter at least one valid future age.
errorGeneric: An error occurred while generating images. Please try again later.
resultsTitle: AI's Prediction of Your Child's Future
howItWorksTitle: How It Works in 3 Simple Steps
howItWorksStep1Desc: Select clear, front-facing photos of the mother, father, and the baby.
howItWorksStep2Desc: Enter the baby's current age and the future ages you'd like to see.
howItWorksStep3Desc: Our AI creates a vision of your child's future. Download and share the results!
featuresItem1Desc: We use a state-of-the-art AI model to blend features and project your child's growth realistically.
featuresItem2Desc: See your child at different life stages, from toddler to young adult.
featuresItem3Desc: Receive detailed, high-resolution images perfect for sharing with family and friends.
featuresItem4Desc: Your privacy is our priority. Photos are processed securely and are not stored.
faqA1: Our AI provides a fun, artistic prediction based on the parents' and baby's features. It's for entertainment and should not be considered a scientific prediction. The results can be surprisingly realistic, but actual appearance will vary!
faqQ2: What are the best practices for uploading photos?
faqA2: For the best results, use clear, high-quality photos where faces are well-lit and looking directly at the camera. Avoid photos with sunglasses, hats, or extreme angles.
faqA3: Yes. We process your photos only to generate the future-face images and do not store them on our servers. Your privacy is important to us.
privacyNote: Your photos are used solely for the generation process and are not stored or shared.
footerText: This tool is for entertainment purposes. The generated images are AI predictions and not a guarantee of future appearance. Your privacy is respected; photos are not stored.
